thread.title: API winner to receive red Arnie's Army cardigan
thread.title_full: API winner to receive red Arnie's Army cardigan

author: nbcsports.com
title: API winner to receive red Arnie's Army cardigan
text:
RSS 
The winner of this year's Arnold Palmer Invitational will be taking home a new award. 
The tournament's official Twitter account sent out the following message Thursday night, with pictures of the new prize over Arnie's old chair: In the name of Arnie’s Army, Arnold Palmer’s iconic red cardigan will be bestowed upon his tournament champion. #LifeWellPlayed #APinv pic.twitter.com/q869RlYxOY — Arnold Palmer Inv. (@APinv) March 16, 2017 
In addition the cardigan, the winner will also walk away with $1.56 million from an expanded purse of $8.7 million. Article Tags: 
Contributions from writers and editors on the Golf Channel Digital team. Editor's Picks
